chapter.text: Byakti ejane abedana karaile, ene sasti samparke yito apatita ha’ba
kaphirasakalara oparata, yara kono pratiraodhakarai na'i
E'ito ahiba allahara taraphara paraa, yijana urdhbaraohanara khatakhatiborara (jakhala) adhikarai
phiraistasakala arau rauha ene eta dinata allahara dise urd'dhagami haya, yara paraimana pancasa hajara bachara
Eteke tumi dhairya dharana karaa parama dhairya
Sihamte e'i dinaka bahu durata thaka buli bharae
Arau ami iyaka nice'i ocarata dekhi acho
Se'idina akasa hai yaba galita dhatura darae
arau parbatasamuha hai yaba rana-biranara unara darae
arau kono antaranga bandhurae antaranga bandhura kha-khabara nusudhiba
sihamtaka ijane-sijanara drstigocara karaoraa ha’ba. Aparaadhiye se'idinara sastira binimayata diba bicaraiba tara santana-santatika
arau tara strai arau bhatrka
arau tara jati-gosthika, yisakale taka asraya dichila
arau prthiraita yisakala ache se'i sakaloke, yate e'i binimaye taka mukti diye
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'ito lelihana ju'i
yiye murara chala khaha'i pelaba
Jahanname se'i byaktika matiba, yiye satyara prati prstha pradarsana karaichila arau mukha ghuraa'i laichila
Arau sampada sancaya karaichila arau se'ibora samraksana karai raakhichila
Niscaya manuhaka srsti karaa haiche atisaya dhairyahina asthiracittaraupe
Yetiya taka bipade sparsa karae tetiya si atimatraa utkanthita hai parae
Arau yetiya taka kalyane sparsa karae tetiya si atisaya krpana hai parae
Kintu chalata pratisthakaraisakalara bahirae
yisakale nija chalatara ksetrata sadaya pratisthita
arau yisakalara dhana-sampadata nirdharaita hakba ache
khojaniya-maganiya arau bancitasakalara babe
arau yisakale pratiphala dirasaka satya buli bisbasa karae
Arau yisakale nija pratipalakara sasti samparke bhita-santrasta
niscaya te'omlokara pratipalakara sastira paraa niraapada hai thaka nayaya
arau yisakale nijara yaunangasamuhara hiphajatakarai
kintu sihamtara patni athaba adhikarabhukta dasira bahirae, ene ksetrata sihamta nindaniya naha’ba
kintu yisakale e'omlokara bahirae anaka kamana karae, sihamte'i simalanghanakarai
Arau yisakale nijara amanata arau pratisrauti raksa karae
arau yisakale nija saksyadanata atala
arau yisakale nijara chalatara hiphajata karae
te'omloke'i jannatasamuhata sanmanita ha’ba
Kaphirasakalara ki ha’la, sihamte dekhuna tomara phale dhapaliya'i ahi ache
som phalara paraa arau ba'om phalara paraa, dale dale
Sihamtara pratyeke'i e'ito asa karae neki ye, taka praacuryamaya jannatata praraesa karaoraa ha’ba
ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya sihamtaka yitorae srsti karaicho seya sihamte jane
Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho udayasthala arau astacalasamuhara pratipalakara, arasye ami saksama
sihamtatakai utkrstasakalaka sihamtara sthalararti karaibalai, arau ene karaata ami aksama nahaya
Eteke sihamtaka nirarthaka katha-bataraa arau khela-dhemalita matta hai thakibalai diya-- yi dinara pratisrauti sihamtaka diya haiche se'i dinara sanmukhina nohoraa paryanta
Se'idina sihamta kabarara paraa drautabegata ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yeniba sihamte kono laksyasthalara phale dhabita haiche
sihamtara drstisamuha aranata arasthata thakiba, apamane sihamtaka acchanna karaiba e'itorae se'idina yara bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haichila
